item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-07-08
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Starbucks (474 Woodward St, Wyman St, Waban). #
  • I'm at Blue Ribbon BBQ (1375 Washington St, Elm St, West Newton). #
  • I'm at Tango Mango Taqueria (1191 Centre St, Newton). #
  • Ughh Sherpa (iPhone Basecamp client) doesn't seem to work in iOS 4. Off to find a better client. Anyone got any ideas? #
